name: p1-adapter
description: P1 add-on for Mozilla WebThings Gateway
author: CandleSmartHome.com

USB port.description: The addon will create a list of all connected USB devices, and pick the number from the list. You can find your device through trial and error.

Custom USB port command.description: For advanced users. Manually override which USB device you want to be used. An example would be '/dev/ttyUSB0' or '/dev/ttyUSB1'

Debugging.description: Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
